long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
MindMorsels - Daily Bite-Sized Knowledge

Transform your new tab page into a source of daily inspiration and learning with MindMorsels. Every time you open a new tab, you'll be greeted with a random, fascinating fact designed to expand your knowledge in a fun and engaging way.

Features:

Daily Facts: Discover new and interesting facts with every new tab you open.
Personalized Experience: Like or dislike facts to tailor future nuggets to your interests.
Quick Access: Easily access popular websites with built-in quick links.
Clean Design: Enjoy a simple, modern interface that's easy on the eyes.
Whether you're a trivia enthusiast or just looking to learn something new every day, MindMorsels is the perfect way to keep your mind sharp and entertained.

Version: 1.0.1
